Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
internship \in"tern*ship\ ([i^]n"t[~e]rn*sh[i^]p), n. 1. (Med.) The state of being an intern; the position of an intern. [PJC]
2. The period of time during which a person is an intern; as, she served her internship over the summer. [PJC]
3. A program to provide novices in a field with apprenticeship training. [PJC]
4. The period of time during which a novice in a field serves in a subordinate capacity and continues to gain experience; the learning period before one becomes an expert. [PJC]
internship n : the position of a medical intern
